constraints.constraint: self.incoming->isEmpty() An initial node has no incoming edge An initial node must have no incoming edge
not self.source.oclIsKindOf(InitialNode) Only control edges can have initial nodes as source Source of an object flow must not be an initial node
self.outgoing->isEmpty() A fianl node has no outgoing edge A final node must have no outgoing edge
-- must be applied on corresponding parameter, if only it exists true --not self.isUnique Object nodes are not unique typed elements isUnique must be false for object nodes.

-- must be applied on corresponding parameter, if only it exists true --((not self.selection.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.isOrdered) and --(self.isOrdered implies (not self.selection.oclIsUndefined())) If an object node has a selection behavior, then the ordering of the object node is ordered, and vice versa. isOrdered means there is a selection behavior for object nodes.

true -- Already checked by validateControlFlow_validateObjectNodes All edges coming into or going out of object nodes must be object flow edges. All edges coming into or going out of object nodes must be object flow edges.

constraint.name: validateInputOutputParameter
constraint.description: A selection behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be a bag of elements of the same type as the object node or a supertype of the type of object node. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of object node. The behavior cannot have side effects.
constraint.message: The selection behavior of an object node must have one input parameter and one output parameter. The parameters types must be compatible with the object node's type.

constraints.constraint: self.isControl implies self.isControlType Control pins have a control type isControl muts imply isControlType for pins.

self.outgoing.target->forAll(inStructuredNode=self.owner) Input pins may have outgoing edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges must target a node contained by the structured node. Input pins may have outgoing edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges must target a node contained by the structured node.

(not self.fromAction.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.fromAction.output->size() = 1 The fromAction of an action input pin must have exactly one output pin. The fromAction of an action input pin must have exactly one output pin.

(not self.fromAction.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.fromAction.input->forAll(oclIsKindOf(ActionInputPin)) The fromAction of an action input pin must only have action input pins as input pins. The fromAction of an action input pin must only have action input pins as input pins.

(not self.fromAction.oclIsUndefined()) implies (self.fromAction.incoming->isEmpty() and self.fromAction.outgoing->isEmpty() and self.fromAction.input->forAll(incoming->isEmpty() and outgoing->isEmpty()) and self.fromAction.output->forAll(incoming->isEmpty() and outgoing->isEmpty())) The fromAction of an action input pin cannot have control or data flows coming into or out of it or its pins. The fromAction of an action input pin cannot have control or data flows coming into or out of it or its pins.

constraint.name: validateCompatibleType
constraint.description: The type of value specification must be compatible with the type of the value pin.
constraint.message: The type of value specification must be compatible with the type of the value pin.

constraints.constraint: self.incoming->isEmpty() Value pins have no incoming edges. Value pins have no incoming edges.

self.incoming.source->forAll(inStructuredNode=self.owner) Output pins may have incoming edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges may not target a node contained by the structured node. Output pins may have incoming edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges may not target a node contained by the structured node.

constraint.name: validateSourceAndTarget
constraint.description: The source and target of an edge must be in the same activity as the edge.
constraint.message: The source and target of an edge must be in the same activity as the edge.

constraints.constraint: self.owner.oclIsKindOf(Activity) or self.owner.oclIsKindOf(ActivityGroup) Activity edges may be owned only by activities or groups. Activity edges may be owned only by activities or groups.
true -- constraint is checked by the model structure Activity edges may be owned by at most one structured node. Activity edges may be owned by at most one structured node.

-- This constraint is implemented separately for not being in live mode. -- Other constraints have been relaxed to supprot null source and target not self.source.oclIsUndefined() and not self.target.oclIsUndefined() The source and target of an edge must be defined. The source and target of an edge must be defined.

constraint.name: validateException_StructuredActivityNode_Constraint2
constraint.description: An edge that has a source in an exception handler structured node must also have its target in the handler, and vice versa.
constraint.message: An edge that has a source in an exception handler structured node must also have its target in the handler, and vice versa.

constraints.constraint: (self.source.oclIsUndefined() or not self.source.oclIsKindOf(Action)) and (self.target.oclIsUndefined() or not self.target.oclIsKindOf(Action)) Object flows may not have actions at either end. You can not link an action with an object flow

constraint.name: validateCompatibleTypes
constraint.description: Object nodes connected by an object flow, with optionally intervening control nodes, must have compatible types. In particular, the downstream object node type must be the same or a supertype of the upstream object node type
constraint.message: The object flow must link object nodes with compatible types (target type must be a supertype of the source type).

constraint.name: validateSameUpperBounds
constraint.description: Object nodes connected by an object flow, with optionally intervening control nodes, must have the same upper bounds.
constraint.message: The object flow must link object nodes with the same upper bounds.

constraint.name: validateTarget
constraint.description: An edge with constant weight may not target an object node, or lead to an object node downstream with no intervening actions, that has an upper bound less than the weight.
constraint.message: The target object node's upper bounds must be less than the object flow weight

constraint.name: validateTransformationBehaviour
constraint.description: A transformation behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be the same as or a supertype of the type of object token coming from the source end. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of object token expected downstream. The behavior cannot have side effects.
constraint.message: A transformation behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be the same as or a supertype of the type of object token coming from the source end. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of object token expected downstream. The behavior cannot have side effects.

constraints.constraint: (not self.selection.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.source.oclIsKindOf(ObjectNode) An object flow may have a selection behavior only if it has an object node as a source. Selection behavior is authorized only when the object flow's source is an object node.

constraint.name: validateInputAndOutputParameter
constraint.description: A selection behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be a bag of elements of the same as or a supertype of the type of source object node. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of source object node. The behavior cannot have side effects.
constraint.message: A selection behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be a bag of elements of the same as or a supertype of the type of source object node. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of source object node. The behavior cannot have side effects.

constraints.constraint: self.isMulticast implies not self.isMultireceive isMulticast and isMultireceive cannot both be true. isMulticast and isMultireceive cannot both be true.

(self.source.oclIsUndefined() or (self.source.oclIsKindOf(ObjectNode) implies self.source.oclAsType(ObjectNode).isControlType) ) and (self.target.oclIsUndefined() or (self.target.oclIsKindOf(ObjectNode) implies self.target.oclAsType(ObjectNode).isControlType) ) Control flows may not have object nodes at either end, except for object nodes with control type You can not link an object node with a control flow (except if its control type is true).

self.outgoing->size() > 0 and self.incoming->size() > 0 and self.incoming->size() <= 2 A decision node has one or two incoming edges and at least one outgoing edge. A decision node has one or two incoming edges and at least one outgoing edge.

(self.incoming->reject(i | i = self.decisionInputFlow)->forAll(oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow)) and self.outgoing->forAll(oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow)) ) or (self.incoming->reject(i | i = self.decisionInputFlow)->forAll(oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow)) and self.outgoing->forAll(oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow)) ) The edges coming into and out of a decision node, other than the decision input flow (if any), must be either all object flows or all control flows. Edges linking the decision node must have be of the same type (except decision input flow).

(not self.decisionInputFlow.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.incoming->includes(self.decisionInputFlow) The decisionInputFlow of a decision node must be an incoming edge of the decision node. The decisionInputFlow of a decision node must be an incoming edge of the decision node.

(not self.decisionInput.oclIsUndefined()) implies ( self.decisionInput.ownedParameter->select( direction = ParameterDirectionKind::out or direction = ParameterDirectionKind::inout)->size() = 0 and self.decisionInput.ownedParameter->select( direction = ParameterDirectionKind::return)->size() = 1 ) A decision input behavior has no output parameters, no in-out parameters and one return parameter. A decision input behavior has no output parameters, no in-out parameters and one return parameter.

(not self.decisionInput.oclIsUndefined()) implies ( (self.decisionInputFlow.oclIsUndefined() and self.incoming->select(i | i.oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow))->size() = 1 ) implies self.decisionInput.ownedParameter->select( direction = ParameterDirectionKind::_in)->size() = 0 ) If the decision node has no decision input flow and an incoming control flow, then a decision input behavior has zero input parameters. If the decision node has no decision input flow and an incoming control flow, then a decision input behavior has zero input parameters.

constraint.name: validateIncomingObjectOneInputParameter
constraint.description: If the decision node has no decision input flow and an incoming object flow, then a decision input behavior has one input parameter whose type is the same as or a supertype of the type of object tokens offered on the incoming edge.
constraint.message: If the decision node has no decision input flow and an incoming object flow, then a decision input behavior has one input parameter whose type is the same as or a supertype of the type of object tokens offered on the incoming edge.

constraint.name: validateIncomingControlOneInputParameter
constraint.description: If the decision node has a decision input flow and an incoming control flow, then a decision input behavior has one input parameter whose type is the same as or a supertype of the type of object tokens offered on the decision input flow.
constraint.message: If the decision node has a decision input flow and an incoming control flow, then a decision input behavior has one input parameter whose type is the same as or a supertype of the type of object tokens offered on the decision input flow.

constraint.name: validateTwoInputParameters
constraint.description: If the decision node has a decision input flow and an second incoming object flow, then a decision input behavior has two input parameters, the first of which has a type that is the same as or a supertype of the type of the type of object tokens offered on the nondecision input flow and the second of which has a type that is the same as or a supertype of the type of object tokens offered on the decision input flow.
constraint.message: If the decision node has a decision input flow and an incoming control flow, then a decision input behavior has one input parameter whose type is the same as or a supertype of the type of object tokens offered on the decision input flow.

constraints.constraint: self.outgoing->size() = 1 A merge node has one outgoing edge. A merge node has one outgoing edge.

(self.outgoing->exists(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow)) implies self.incoming->forAll(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow))) and (self.outgoing->exists(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow)) implies self.incoming->forAll(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow))) The edges coming into and out of a merge node must be either all object flows or all control flows. The edges coming into and out of a merge node must be either all object flows or all control flows.
self.incoming->size() = 1 A fork node has one incoming edge. A fork node has one incoming edge.

(self.incoming->exists(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow)) implies self.outgoing->forAll(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow))) and (self.incoming->exists(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow)) implies self.outgoing->forAll(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow))) The edges coming into and out of a fork node must be either all object flows or all control flows. The edges coming into and out of a fork node must be either all object flows or all control flows.
self.outgoing->size() = 1 A join node has one outgoing edge. A join node has one outgoing edge.

(self.incoming->select(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow))->notEmpty() implies self.outgoing->exists(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow))) and (self.incoming->select(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ObjectFlow))->isEmpty() implies self.outgoing->exists(e | e.oclIsKindOf(ControlFlow))) If a join node has an incoming object flow, it must have an outgoing object flow, otherwise, it must have an outgoing control flow. If a join node has an incoming object flow, it must have an outgoing object flow, otherwise, it must have an outgoing control flow.

(self.incoming->notEmpty() implies self.outgoing->isEmpty()) and (self.outgoing->notEmpty() implies self.incoming->isEmpty()) An activity parameter node must not have both incoming and outgoing edges. An activity parameter node must not have both incoming and outgoing edges.
(not self.classifier.oclIsUndefined()) implies (self.classifier.isAbstract = false) Check that the classifier is not abstract The classifier cannot be abstract.

(not self.classifier.oclIsUndefined()) implies (not self.classifier.oclIsKindOf(uml::AssociationClass)) Check that the classifier is not an association class The classifier cannot be an association class.
self.structuralFeature.featuringClassifier->size() = 1 Check that a structural feature has exactly one featuringClassifier. A structural feature has exactly one featuringClassifier.

self.value->notEmpty() implies self.value.type = self.structuralFeature.type Check valide that the type of the input pin is the same than the one from the structural feature The type of the value input pin is the same as the type of the structural feature.

result->notEmpty() implies self.result.type = self.object.type Check that the type of the result output pin is the same as the type of the inherited object input pin. The type of the result output pin is the same as the type of the inherited object input pin.

constraint.name: A value input pin is required

constraints.constraint: self.value -> notEmpty() Check that a value input pin is required org.eclipse.uml2.uml.util.UMLValidator.validateAddStructuralFeatureValueAction
self.structuralFeature.featuringClassifier->size() = 1 Check that a structural feature has exactly one featuringClassifier. A structural feature has exactly one featuringClassifier.
if self.target.oclIsUndefined() then true else self.target.type->size() = 0 endif Check that the input pin has no type The input pin has no type
(not self.structuralFeature.oclIsUndefined()) implies (self.structuralFeature.isStatic = false) Check that the structural feature must not be static. The structural feature must not be static.

self.structuralFeature.featuringClassifier.oclAsType(Type)->includes(self.object.type) or self.structuralFeature.oclAsType(Property).opposite.type = self.object.type Check that the structural feature must either be owned by the type of the object input pin, or it must be an owned end of a binary The structural feature must either be owned by the type of the object input pin, or it must be an owned end of a binary
self.object.lowerBound()=1 and self.object.upperBound()=1 Check that the multiplicity of the object input pin must be 1..1. The multiplicity of the object input pin must be 1..1.
self.structuralFeature.featuringClassifier->size() = 1 Check that a structural feature has exactly one featuringClassifier. A structural feature has exactly one featuringClassifier.
self.value -> notEmpty() Check that a value input pin is required. A value input pin is required.

self.value -> notEmpty() implies self.value.type = self.variable.type Check that the type input pin is the same as the type of the variable. The type input pin is the same as the type of the variable.
self.value.lowerBound()=1 and self.value.upperBound()=1 Check that the multiplicity of the input pin is 1..1. The multiplicity of the input pin is 1..1.
self.variable.isAccessibleBy(self) Check that the action must be in the scope of the variable. The action must be in the scope of the variable.

self.result.type =self.variable.type and self.result.isOrdered = self.variable.isOrdered Check that the type and ordering of the result output pin of a read-variable action are the same as the type and ordering of the The type and ordering of the result output pin of a read-variable action are the same as the type and ordering of the

(self.result.lowerBound() <= self.variable.lowerBound()) and (self.result.upperBound() >= self.variable.lowerBound()) Check that the multiplicity of the variable must be compatible with the multiplicity of the output pin The multiplicity of the variable must be compatible with the multiplicity of the output pin

constraint.name: validateException_HandlerBody_Constraint4
constraint.description: The handler body has one input, and that input is the same as the exception input.
constraint.message: The handler body has one input, and that input is the same as the exception input.

constraint.name: validateException_StructuredActivityNode_Constraint3
constraint.description: If the protected node is a StructuredActivityNode with output pins, then the exception handler body must also be a StructuredActivityNode with output pins that correspond in number and types to those of the protected node.
constraint.message: If the protected node is a StructuredActivityNode with output pins, then the exception handler body must also be a StructuredActivityNode with output pins that correspond in number and types to those of the protected node.

constraint.name: validateException_SourceAndTargetEdge_Constraint1
constraint.description: The exception handler and its input object node are not the source or target of any edge.
constraint.message: The exception handler and its input object node are not the source or target of any edge.

constraint.name: validateInterruptibleEdge
constraint.description: Validate the constraint for interruptible Edge
constraint.message: Interrupting edges of a region must have their source node in the region and their target node outside the region in the

extension.category: Validate that Pin and corresponding Parameter are correctly synchronized

constraint.name: PinAndParameterSynchronizer
constraint.description: Action's Pins and invoked object's Parameters are synchronized
constraint.message: Action's Pins must correspond to the called object's Parameters

extension.category: Validate that Activity Parameter Node and corresponding Parameter type are correctly synchronized

constraint.name: ActivityParameterAndParameterSynchronizer
constraint.description: Validate that Activity Parameter Node and corresponding Parameter type are correctly synchronized
constraint.message: Activity parameter node must be synchronized with its parameter.
